messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the material of the weapon?
black metal
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens when the target hits the electric jolt from the weapon?
the target must make a CON roll or fall unconscious for 1D6 rounds
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if a Mi-go targets suffer damage from the electric gun?
They take normal rolled damage (surface burns to the carapace)
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the probability of a human successfully firing the electric gun?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the base chance for a human attacking with the Firearms (Electric Gun) skill?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
On which roll should you attempt to fire the Electric Gun?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the base chance for a human attacking with the Firearms (Electric Gun) skill?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the effect of the Electric Gun when viewed through the Glass from Leng?
The user can see random visions of other places, including beings from the Cthulhu Mythos
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who inscribes a pentagram in red chalk before using the Glass from Leng?
The possessor
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is inscribed on the glass in the ritual?
A pentagram in red chalk
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What artifact is built by worshippers of Shub-Niggurath?
The Moon Lens
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the Moon Lens used for?
The Moon Lens is used to concentrate a beam of moonlight and aid in the summoning of Shub-Niggurath at the full moon.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Where is the Moon Lens located?
The Moon Lens is located within Goatswood, in the Severn Valley of England.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How is the scene viewed in the text?
It appears randomly.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the purpose of the moon lens?
To concentrate a beam of moonlight and aid in the summoning of Shub-Niggurath with a Thousand Young at the full moon.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the purpose of the elder things' use of this dimension?
They actively exploited it to traverse the universe.
